entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Haliburton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:58 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 2:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
